data.name: Add commas to long numbers
data.description:
# Add commas to long numbers

> In representing large numbers, from the **right side to the left**, English texts usually use commas to separate each **group of three digits** in front of the decimal.
[wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comma#In_numbers)

# Input
A number. *(only **positive integers** in this kata)*

# Output
The number formatted with commas.

# Examples
```
1          -> "1"
256        -> "256"
65536      -> "65,536"
4294967296 -> "4,294,967,296"
```

# Next Challenge
Too easy? Try `tdowek1`'s version w/ negatives and floats!

[Add commas to a number - tdowek1](https://www.codewars.com/kata/56a115cadb39a2faa000001e)
